summary: A small peasant village's struggles against the careless inroads of the large local landowner, The Land shows why political oppression does not necessarily lead to a sense of solidarity among the disinherited.
cast: Mahmoud Al Meleji|Nagwa Ibrahim|Ezzat El Alaili|Hamdy Ahmed|Ali El Sherif|Yehia Chahine|Salah El-Saadany|Tawfik El Deken
title: Al-ard
